div.p: Guymon Public School District offers K-12 education to students of diverse cultures. We emphasize the social, emotional, physical and intellectual development of each child and strive to instill high standards for academic integrity and leadership in our students. Through our programs, students are given the technology, skills and knowledge to be effective members of our school community and global society.
